CREATE TABLE "trackdata" ("id_trackdata" INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, "waybill" TEXT(24), "shortwaybill" TEXT(24), "srvcid" TEXT(24), "srvcdescspa" TEXT(24), "srvcdesceng" TEXT(24), "custnumber" TEXT(24), "packagetype" TEXT(24), "adtnlinfo" TEXT(24), "statusspa" TEXT(24), "statuseng" TEXT(24), "pd_org_acronym" TEXT(24), "pd_org_name" TEXT(24), "pd_pkup_date" TEXT(24), "dd_dst_acronym" TEXT(24), "dd_dst_name" TEXT(24), "dd_dlvry_date" TEXT(24), "dd_zip" TEXT(24), "dd_rcvr" TEXT(24), "dm_weight" TEXT(24), "dm_volweight" TEXT(24), "dm_width" TEXT(24), "dm_length" TEXT(24), "dm_height" TEXT(24), "wbrd_org_waybill" TEXT(24), "wbrd_rplc_waybill" TEXT(24), "rtrndd_initl_waybill" TEXT(24), "rtrndd_final_waybill" TEXT(24), "msd_prec_waybills" TEXT(24), "msd_foll_waybills" TEXT(24), "msd_wb_list" TEXT(24), "intld_intl_waybill" TEXT(24), "intld_org_countrycode" TEXT(24), "intld_org_countryspa" TEXT(24), "intld_org_countryeng" TEXT(24), "cstminfo_reference" TEXT(24), "cstminfo_costsCentre" TEXT(24), "id_ctl_favoritos" INTEGER NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE "history" ( "id_history" INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, "evnt_date" TEXT(20), "evnt_id" TEXT(50), "evnt_desc_spa" TEXT(200), "evnt_desc_eng" TEXT(200), "evnt_place_acronym" TEXT(200), "evnt_place_name" TEXT(200), "except_code" TEXT(3), "except_descspa" TEXT(200), "except_desceng" TEXT(200), "except_details" TEXT(200), "id_trackdata" INTEGER NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE "ctl_favoritos" ("id_ctl_favoritos" INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL,"guia" TEXT(24),"rastreo" TEXT(24),"alias" TEXT(100),"fecha_registro" TEXT(20) NOT NULL, "notifica" integer not null default(0))
CREATE TABLE estados ( Z_PK INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, ZNUMEROESTADO INTEGER, ZLATITUD VARCHAR, ZLONGITUD VARCHAR, ZNOMBRE VARCHAR )
CREATE TABLE "offices" ( "id_office" INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, "ent" TEXT(24), "opt" TEXT(24), "estado" TEXT(24), "calle1" TEXT(200), "calle2" TEXT(200), "ciudad" TEXT(200), "codigo_postal" TEXT(10), "colonia" TEXT(200), "correo" TEXT(200), "entrega_oficina" TEXT(200), "ext1" TEXT(10), "ext2" TEXT(10), "horario_atencion" TEXT(200), "horario_comida" TEXT(200), "horario_ext" TEXT(200), "horario_recol" TEXT(200), "horario_sabatino" TEXT(200), "idcatalogo" TEXT(24), "latitud" TEXT(24), "longitud" TEXT(24), "no_oficina" TEXT(24), "nombre" TEXT(200), "telefono1" TEXT(50), "telefono2" TEXT(50), "tipo_oficina" TEXT(5), "tipos_pago" TEXT(200), "version" TEXT(25), "ciudad_n" TEXT(200), "colonia_n" TEXT(200))
CREATE TABLE codigos ( Z_PK INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, ZCLAVE VARCHAR, ZDESCRIPCIONCLAVE VARCHAR, ZIDCATALOGO VARCHAR, ZVERSION VARCHAR )
CREATE TABLE "paises" ("id" INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, "idpais" TEXT, "nombrepais_esp" TEXT, "nombrepais_ing" TEXT)
MainActivity
